room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Shelter" by Escape SBC in Shreveport
review: My son celebrated part of his 14th birthday with his friends at Escape Shreveport and had a blast! The staff was great and the Fallout Shelter was such a fun room. The boys could not stop talking about it last night and can't wait to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Shelter" by Escape SBC in Shreveport
review: This was our first escape room experience and we all had a blast! We went into The Fallout Shelter and never made our way out! The staff was amazing and the facility was welcoming and super clean. Definitely recommend for a family fun night!

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Shelter" by Escape SBC in Shreveport
review: Fallout Shelter was awesome. It provided a great challenge for us. We are normally out of the box thinkers and it still gave us a run for our money. If you haven't participated in on yet you're missing out on a great time.

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Shelter" by Escape SBC in Shreveport
review: Definitely an exhilarating experience. The staff is super nice, and helpful. We did the Fallout Shelter, and definitely will be back to try the other rooms. I would definitely recommend this for a group or couple. It gets your mind ticking and heart pumping as you race against the clock.

room_title: Escape room "The Fallout Shelter" by Escape SBC in Shreveport
review: My husband, my sister and I had a lot of fun in the Fallout Shelter. Staff is very nice and informative. The room was challenging and you needed out of the box thinking. Very nice alternative to going to the movies or going out to eat. Requires teamwork but that's what made it fun! I would for sure go back and do this again!
